meanings.definition: A lever or projection that moves another part, such as a cam or pushrod
meanings.sent1: The tappets in the machine help to lift the heavy load.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic adjusted the tappets to ensure smooth engine operation.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous gnome used the tappets to play a prank on the other machines.
meanings.sent4: Her words acted as tappets, pushing him towards a decision.
meanings.sent5: The tappets clicked and clacked, creating a rhythmic sound in the workshop.

meanings.definition: A mechanism in an engine that controls the opening and closing of valves
meanings.sent1: The tappets regulate the flow of air in the engine.
meanings.sent2: When the tappets malfunction, the engine may produce strange noises.
meanings.sent3: The tappets in the engine decided to have a race to see who could open and close the valves the fastest.
meanings.sent4: His heart worked like tappets, opening and closing with each emotion.
meanings.sent5: The tappets danced in harmony, orchestrating the symphony of the engine's performance.

meanings.definition: A device used in machinery to transmit motion or pressure
meanings.sent1: The tappets transfer the force from the motor to the wheels.
meanings.sent2: Engineers designed the tappets to efficiently transfer power within the system.
meanings.sent3: The tappets in the factory had a secret language to communicate motion plans.
meanings.sent4: Her determination acted as tappets, propelling her towards her goals.
meanings.sent5: The tappets hummed with energy, transferring the power of the machine.
